title: The Poetic Diary of Love and Change
description: Have you had your heart broken? Are you feeling devastated by losing the love of your life? Has divorce broken your heart into a million pieces? It can make you feel as though you cannot go on and that you will never love again. Clarissa O. Clemens found herself drowning in the pain of a broken heart. She took her pen in hand and began processing all of those feelings writing poems of hopeful verse providing solace to her aching heart. Here is a sample: Abyss of Nothingness Existing in the abyss of nothingness Floating in the great beyond Clinging to the feeling of weightlessness Dreaming of the unbreakable bond Sinking into swirling seas Trusting the future to the powers that be Twirling spirits creating clouds Searching for you with the crowd... Reviews & Accolades: "...it was if she was reaching into my soul, into my heart and interpreting my raw emotions into words..." "Clarissa is a true artist and this book a true work of art." "...will help heal and mend your broken heart...a must read." This is the 1st volume in the series, The Poetic Diary of Love and Change, written by the accomplished poet, Ms. Clarissa O. Clemens. Pick up all 3 volumes and begin the healing.
author: Clarissa O. Clemens
